title: I need rune advice
body:
I am pretty bad with my runes.... i kinda hit 30, established a set of 4 pages, and forgot about them.... i currently have 6300 ip and i want to figure out how to use  this to best improve my current pages.

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/27263914#runes

are my pages, I use my MS page for jungling. keep in mind i have used these pages since season 3 made them before i even started ranked. they are pretty bleh, and definitely need more than 6300 ip worth of love, but it is a start.

any constructive advice is appreciated
